properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jayamani paadu prabhu yesunake Hossanna jai prabhu vachchu Chunde yentho santasamu Madyaakaasha mandu sandhinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manamu maaredamu marmamidi goppade Boora dwani mrogagane mana Mettha badedamu priya Yesuni Sandhimpa, mana maayana vaarame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuni poli yundumu prabhuni santatigaa Prabhuvu pratyakshamai nappudu Amarthyatha dharintumu pondedamu Prabhuvune, mana maayana vaaramu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana nireekshana ye prabhuni chootumani Thrupti chendi nimpa badedam Vaanchalu theerunu prabhuni Ruchinchedamu, mana maayana vaaramu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daiva sankalpame prabhuvutho nundute Devuni gruha maananda mahimatho Nindi yundunu prabhuvu mana vaadu Mana maayana vaarame{/lang-eng}
